Even if they have brought RK back in the past, it still can't hurt to 
let them know there are people out here interested in it.  (And 
eventually, they *will* decide to quit showing it... )  And I think 
it can't hurt to bring up PMK in association with it.  May fall on 
completely deaf ears, but stranger things have happened.  :-D

phil (who's always afraid she's gonna hit the 'send' button 
accidentally)

--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, Warg3791@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 4/14/2004 1:17:17 PM Eastern Standard Time, 
> mg_batt@y... writes:
> I don't know how far Cartoon Network got into Kenshin... What 
episode 
> did it stop? Did they even finish the Kyoto arc? Personally, for me 
> if it did I'd rather have the anime stop right there as I've always 
> felt it went downhill after especially towards the end... If they 
> didn't even do the Kyoto arc yet, then yeah, I'd definitely be 
upset. 
> They showed the Kyoto arc...Once. Last summer. That was it. And I 
missed the 
> final showdown with Shishio! That's why I got mad and rounded the 
entire thing 
> up on DVD. They were too slow about showing anything. Now they're 
not even 
> going to show it a second time (at least not yet). EVIL CN. 
> 
>
